branchCategory.name: 10-SY3/5/7/9*40 5 Port, Base Mounted, Single Valve, Clean Series
branchCategory.description: <P>Series 10-SY offers major advances in valve performance for cost-effective solutions to your requirements. The series offers high flow with low power consumption in a compact design. After inspection, products are blown with high purity air (clean bench/class M3.5) in a clean enviroment.  Products are sealed and shipped in anti-static double bags. The 10-SY is also available in body ported or base mounted styles and can be used individually or manifold mounted. </P>
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Fluid: air <LI>Operating pressure range: (internal pilot) 0.1 - 0.7MPa<BR>(external pilot) -100kPa to 0.7MPa<BR>(external pilot, pilot pressure range) 0.25 - 0.7MPa <LI>Effective area mm<SUP> 2</SUP> (Cv): body ported 4.14 (0.23);<BR>base mounted 5.4 (0.3) <LI>Coil rated voltage: 3, 5, 6, 12, 24VDC;<BR>100, 110, 200, 220VAC <LI>Response time (0.5MPa) w/o indicator light &<BR>surge voltage suppressor: 15ms or less <LI>Ambient & fluid temperature: 50°C </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: 10-SY3/5/7/9*40 5 Port, Base Mounted, Single Valve, Clean Series
